professional experience.name: AppsCode Inc.
professional experience.summary: Undertook this internship as part of my undergraduate curriculum, gaining hands-on industry experience while fulfilling course credit requirements.
highlights: Developed and integrated RESTful API endpoints using Go.

professional experience.name: Kinetik Healthcare Solutions
professional experience.summary: Working as a full-time software engineer for a U.S.-based startup, contributing to an Uber-like app for medical transportation as one of the three core members of the iOS team.
highlights: Developing the iOS mobile application from scratch
Designed the frontend with Swift, UIKit.
Implementing the backend with NodeJs, gRPC, MongoDB, TypeScript, NestJs

research experience.name: CUET NLP Lab
research experience.summary: Conducting research under Professor Dr. Mohammed Moshiul Hoque, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and large language model (LLM) applications for Bangla language tasks.
highlights: Building a benchmark to evaluate RAG models in the Bengali language.
Developing a Bangla open-domain question-answering dataset tailored for RAG applications.
Creating a robust RAG framework for Bengali open-domain question answering.

research experience.summary: Conducted independent research with peers on sentiment analysis and emotion classification, focusing on multimodal approaches and the detection of sarcasm in product reviews.
highlights: Developed a multimodal Bangla social media dataset of 4,660 samples and designed a system for multimodal emotion classification, with findings published in IEEE - ICCIT 2023.
Separated sarcastic elements in online product reviews using binary classification, followed by multi-label sentiment analysis, with results published in Springer Nature Singapore - BIM 2023.

research experience.name: Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology
research experience.summary: Worked under the supervision of Assistant Professor Animesh Chandra Roy to design a hybrid model for Bangla emotion detection, integrating lexicon features with pre-trained transformer models.
highlights: Developed an emotion lexicon of 5,336 Bangla terms.
Improved classification performance by incorporating lexicon features with transformer models.
Published findings in EMNLP 2023 - BLP Workshop.

teaching experience.name: Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology
teaching experience.summary: Served as a judge and problem setter for multiple divisional and national inter-university programming competitions. Authored and reviewed problems, coordinated problem sets, and ensured contest quality across events.
highlights: CUET CodeStorm 1.0 - Inter University Programming Contest 2024.
CUET CSE Fest - Inter University Programming Contest 2022.
IIUC CSE Fest Programming Contest 2022.

teaching experience.name: International Islamic University Chittagong
teaching experience.summary: Served as a trainer, using my competitive programming background to prepare IIUC teams for the International Collegiate Programming Contest.
highlights: Conducted over 20 training sessions on Algorithms and Data Structures for a group of 100+ students.
Reformed and coached teams that went on to secure 2nd and 3rd place in two inter-university programming contests.

teaching experience.name: Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology
teaching experience.summary: Appointed as a TA for the "Structured Programming" course under Assistant Professor Md. Sabir Hossain.
highlights: Organized assignments and project-based tasks.
Provided one-on-one guidance to enhance students' foundational knowledge.
Arranged workshops, seminars & contests on regular basis.
Created annual curriculum and programming syllabus for the club members.
